channel.title: RemotePvP - The most revolutionary MMORPG to date!
channel.description:
[SIZE=6][CENTER][color=green][FONT=Andale Mono]RemotePvP[/FONT][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[color=yellow] [CENTER]Introduction: RemotePvP is a brand new MMORPG. We are looking to build a nice friendly community. Our main focus here at RemotePvP is the happiness of our players. No one person owns RemotePvP. The players make the decisions on the content changes!
[COLOR=blue]Attributes: Unique and surprising combat system! Never before seen AI! Revolutionary bossing system! Many group activities! Months worth of content! We provide a challenge to RemotePvP! RemotePvP's map would take days to explore! Economy support. Rare, non obtainable items. Three different combat styles. Release date: 7/24/13 No duplicate items! (No two items look the same) Helpful Staff team Downloadable and Webclient Support! [/COLOR]
[COLOR=purple]Story of RemotePvP A few friends were tired of playing terrible games. We no longer wanted to get frustrated on buggy irritable games. We were tired of playing repetitive Private servers. As a result we decided to make RemotePvP. After countless hours and days of development it is finally finished and ready to take on players! We only use the top developers to insure the best experience while playing RemotePvP. [/COLOR]
[COLOR=red][SIZE=4][B]This is not a RSPS! This is RemotePvP![/B][/SIZE][/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Media:
[IMG]http://i1078.photobucket.com/albums/w483/rar349/remotepvp1_zps8517f023.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1078.photobucket.com/albums/w483/rar349/remotepvp4_zps3e5db075.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1078.photobucket.com/albums/w483/rar349/remotepvp6_zpsa3e33482.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1078.photobucket.com/albums/w483/rar349/remotepvp3_zps7f4a6959.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1078.photobucket.com/albums/w483/rar349/remotepvp7_zps21312590.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1078.photobucket.com/albums/w483/rar349/remotepvp2_zps92955ef0.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1078.photobucket.com/albums/w483/rar349/remotepvp5_zps8220cb56.png[/img]
[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red][SIZE=5]Links:[/SIZE]
Website --> [url=http://remotepvpwebclient.net16.net/]RemotePvP - Index[/url]
[/CENTER]

item.title: RemotePvP - The most revolutionary MMORPG to date!
item.dc:creator: @rikkert44 rikkert44
item.description:
@rikkert44 wrote:

This is not a RSPS! This is RemotePvP!

If it is not a rsps why advertise here?

item.title: RemotePvP - The most revolutionary MMORPG to date!
item.dc:creator: @Stunninhigh Stunninhigh
item.description:
@Stunninhigh wrote:

[quote=“ReaperXScape, post:3, topic:526516”]You should honestly learn the term “Mmorpg” before using it to describe an RSPS… Lmao

The only rsps that could be currently barely be considered an rsps is probably SoulPlit.

Mmorpg = Massive Multiman Online Role Playing Game

Massive meaning a massive amount of players, wich im sure you dont have.

Point prooven.[/quote]

LOOOOOOL huge fail.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Dick_Salad wrote:

[SIZE=6][CENTER][color=green][FONT=Andale Mono]RemotePvP[/FONT][/COLOR][/CENTER]

[color=yellow]
[CENTER]Introduction:
RemotePvP is a brand new MMORPG. We are looking to build a nice friendly community. Our main focus here at RemotePvP is the happiness of our players. No one person owns RemotePvP. The players make the decisions on the content changes!

[COLOR=blue]Attributes:
Unique and surprising combat system!
Never before seen AI!
Revolutionary bossing system!
Many group activities!
Months worth of content!
We provide a challenge to RemotePvP!
RemotePvP’s map would take days to explore!
Economy support.
Rare, non obtainable items.
Three different combat styles.
Release date: 7/24/13
No duplicate items! (No two items look the same)
Helpful Staff team
Downloadable and Webclient Support!
[/COLOR]

[COLOR=purple]Story of RemotePvP
A few friends were tired of playing terrible games. We no longer wanted to get frustrated on buggy irritable games. We were tired of playing repetitive Private servers. As a result we decided to make RemotePvP. After countless hours and days of development it is finally finished and ready to take on players! We only use the top developers to insure the best experience while playing RemotePvP.
[/COLOR]
